The ASCII diagram code block is marked as 'dart' language but is not valid Dart code

suggestedNewContent.title: Your Digital Identity
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Compare a digital business card app to a physical business card - both contain name, title, contact info, but the digital version can include interactive elements, be shared instantly, and be updated anytime

suggestedNewContent.title: Step 4: Add Name and Title
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Add Text widgets for the user's name (large, bold, white) and title/profession (smaller, grey or lighter color). Explain Text styling with fontSize, fontWeight, color, and letterSpacing

suggestedNewContent.title: Step 5: Add a Divider
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Introduce the Divider and SizedBox widgets to create visual separation between the photo/name section and contact info section

suggestedNewContent.title: Understanding SafeArea
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain why SafeArea is important - protects UI from being hidden behind device notches, status bars, and navigation bars. Show before/after screenshots

suggestedNewContent.title: Step 8: Add Social Media Icons
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Deliver on the promise from 'What We're Building' by adding a Row of social media icons. Introduce the concept of icon buttons for the next module

suggestedNewContent.title: Common Mistakes in Layout
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover: forgetting commas between widgets in lists, incorrect widget nesting, using Column/Row without proper parent constraints, forgetting to import material.dart

suggestedNewContent.title: Complete Business Card Code
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Provide the full, runnable code that combines all steps with proper const usage and modern Dart syntax. Include comments explaining each section
